name: Groupe Carrefour
goal: Le groupe Carrefour est une entreprise du secteur de la distribution ayant une forte activité à l'international. Le groupe est présent en propre dans six pays de l'Union Européenne.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Agricultural Policy
Supply Chain Initiative and Commercial Practices
Internal Market
Circular Economy / Food Waste
